name: CLKComplicationTemplateModularLargeTable
desc: A template for displaying a header row and columns.

items.name: init(headerTextProvider: CLKTextProvider, row1Column1TextProvider: CLKTextProvider, row1Column2TextProvider: CLKTextProvider, row2Column1TextProvider: CLKTextProvider, row2Column2TextProvider: CLKTextProvider)
items.desc: Creates a template that has a header and two columns of text.

items.name: init(headerImageProvider: CLKImageProvider?, headerTextProvider: CLKTextProvider, row1Column1TextProvider: CLKTextProvider, row1Column2TextProvider: CLKTextProvider, row2Column1TextProvider: CLKTextProvider, row2Column2TextProvider: CLKTextProvider)
items.desc: Creates a template that has a header row with an image and text, and two columns of text.

items.name: var headerImageProvider: CLKImageProvider?
items.desc: An optional image to display in the header.

items.name: var headerTextProvider: CLKTextProvider
items.desc: The text to display in the header line.

items.name: var row1Column1TextProvider: CLKTextProvider
items.desc: The text to display in the first column of the first row.

items.name: var row1Column2TextProvider: CLKTextProvider
items.desc: The text to display in the second column of the first row.

items.name: var row2Column1TextProvider: CLKTextProvider
items.desc: The text to display in the first column of the second row.

items.name: var row2Column2TextProvider: CLKTextProvider
items.desc: The text to display in the second column of the second row.

items.name: var column2Alignment: CLKComplicationColumnAlignment
items.desc: The alignment of the text in the second column.
